title: Reese Witherspoon Confirms Oprah Is the Oprah-est Coworker
text: Reese Witherspoon Confirms Oprah Is the Oprah-est Coworker Most Popular By Alyssa Bailey Mar 22, 2017 Reese Witherspoon recently had the honor of working alongside Oprah Winfrey for a few weeks in New Zealand on A Wrinkle in Time. She made sure you knew how great that was on her Instagram: A post shared by Reese Witherspoon (@reesewitherspoon) on Mar 16, 2017 at 11:48am PDT Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A post shared by Reese Witherspoon (@reesewitherspoon) on Feb 24, 2017 at 8:59am PST Most Popular And confirmed it again last night on Conan , when she discussed how Winfrey is literally better than even your greatest dream coworker. Witherspoon and Winfrey spent three hours together each morning in hair and makeup, "and she'd do the voice, like, 'HELLO!'," Witherspoon said, doing the most Oprah impression. "'Who wants COFFEE?' And you're like, 'oh my god, she's doing the voice!'" (Witherspoon's take on it is pretty great.) Winfrey gave book recommendations, life advice, and also "just loves to bring everyone muffins. But not like a regular muffin; she has muffins flown in from like Napa." A post shared by Reese Witherspoon (@reesewitherspoon) on Feb 23, 2017 at 1:16am PST Could she BE any more perfect
